titleStmt.title: A sermon preached on the first of January 1698 in the parish church of St. Nicholas Cole-Abby being a New-Years-gift to the society of Christians united there to worship God in a more solemn manner after the way of the Church of England / by Robert Howson.
titleStmt.author: Howson, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Downing for the author,
